shot.composition: POV approaching the massive Mitral Valve in the heart, experiencing the immense pressure and sudden release. 16:9.
shot.lens: Wide-angle macro bio-lens to emphasize the cathedral-like scale of the heart chamber.
shot.frame_rate: 120fps, with variable speed ramping (slow motion during valve closure).
shot.camera_movement: Slow build-up in the atrium, then a sudden, explosive acceleration through the valve opening, slight backward look as it slams shut.

subject.description: Immense valve leaflets (fibrous, powerful tissue) opening dramatically and then slamming shut with incredible force. A dense stream of red blood cells being pumped through.
subject.props: Chordae tendineae (heartstrings) visible, taut and strong, anchoring the valve like massive cables.

scene.location: Left Atrium and Ventricle of the Human Heart
scene.environment: A vast, muscular chamber. The walls are thick, powerful, and constantly contracting. The scale is immense.

visual_details.action: The camera is buffeted by the sudden change in pressure, experiencing the raw power of the heartbeat from the inside. The intense rush of blood through the gateway.
visual_details.special_effects: High-pressure fluid dynamics, shockwaves visualization upon valve closure, realistic tissue deformation of the valve, intense motion blur during acceleration.
visual_details.negative_prompt_video: Slow movement, gentle closing, blurry textures, low resolution, compression artifacts, black and white, grey tones, minimalism, weak appearance, quiet.

cinematography.lighting: Dramatic, chiaroscuro lighting from within the chamber. Deep shadows, with bright highlights on the edges of the valve leaflets and the rushing blood.
cinematography.color_palette: Deep saturated reds, crimson, mahogany, stark white (valve tissue/heartstrings).

audio.music: Powerful, rhythmic orchestral score dominated by massive percussion (e.g., Taiko drums) synchronized perfectly with the heartbeat, building to a crescendo.
audio.ambient: Loud, pressurized fluid movement. The thunderous sound of the heartbeat echoing.
audio.sound_effects: Massive, deep 'LUB-DUB' sound. The loud, resonant SNAP of the valve closing. Extreme whooshing during passage.
audio.mix_level: Extremely dynamic range, powerful low-end frequencies (LFE).
